resource_data:
<expression xsi:schemaLocation="http://www.imsglobal.org/xsd/imslorsltitm_v1p0 http://fire.eun.org/lode/imslorsltitm_v1p0.xsd" xmlns="http://www.imsglobal.org/xsd/imslorsltitm_v1p0" xmlns:xsi="http://www.w3.org/2001/XMLSchema-instance">
  <identifier>
    <catalog>hdl</catalog>
    <entry>10494/104593</entry>
  </identifier>
  <identifier>
    <catalog>expression-cmr-id</catalog>
    <entry>104593</entry>
  </identifier>
  <description>
    <facet>
      <vocabularyID>LRE.expressionDescriptionFacetValues</vocabularyID>
      <value>main</value>
    </facet>
    <metadata>
      <schema>http://ltsc.ieee.org/xsd/LOM</schema>
      <lom xsi:schemaLocation="http://ltsc.ieee.org/xsd/LOM http://ltsc.ieee.org/xsd/lomv1.0/lomLoose.xsd" xmlns="http://ltsc.ieee.org/xsd/LOM">
        <general>
          <identifier>
            <catalog>oercommons.org</catalog>
            <entry>1770207242</entry>
          </identifier>
          <title>
            <string language="en">Theodore Roosevelt: His Life and Times on Film</string>
            <string language="x-mt-de">Theodore Roosevelt: Seine Lebensdauer und 
Zeiten auf Film</string>
            <string language="x-mt-fr">Theodore Roosevelt : La sa vie et périodes 
sur le film</string>
            <string language="x-mt-pt">Theodore Roosevelt: Suas vida e épocas na 
película</string>
            <string language="x-mt-it">Theodore Roosevelt: La suoi vita e periodi 
sulla pellicola</string>
            <string language="x-mt-el">Theodore Roosevelt: Η ζωή και οι χρόνοι του
στην ταινία</string>
            <string language="x-mt-es">Theodore Roosevelt: Su vida y épocas en la 
película</string>
          </title>
          <description>
            <string language="en">features 104 short films which record events in Roosevelt's life from the Spanish-American War in 1898 to his death in 1919. In addition to scenes of Roosevelt, these films include views of world figures, politicians, monarchs, and friends and family members.</string>
          </description>
          <keyword>
            <string language="en">Social Sciences</string>
          </keyword>
          <language>en</language>
          <description>
            <string language="x-mt-de">kennzeichnet 104 kurze Filme, die Rekordfälle im 
Leben Roosevelts vom Spanisch-Amerikanischen Krieg 1898 zu seinem Tod 
1919. Zusätzlich zu den Szenen von Roosevelt, schließen diese 
Filme Ansichten der Weltabbildungen, der Politiker, der Monarchen und 
der Freunde und der Familie Bauteile ein.</string>
          </description>
          <description>
            <string language="x-mt-fr">comporte 104 films courts qui des événements 
record dans la vie de Roosevelt de la guerre Espagnol-Américaine en 
1898 à sa mort en 1919. En plus des scènes de Roosevelt, ces 
films incluent des vues des chiffres du monde, des politiciens, des 
monarques, et des amis et des membres de famille.</string>
          </description>
          <description>
            <string language="x-mt-pt">caracteriza 104 películas curtas que eventos 
record na vida de Roosevelt da guerra Espanhol-Americana em 1898 a sua
morte em 1919. Além às cenas de Roosevelt, estas películas 
incluem opiniões figuras do mundo, políticos, monarchs, e amigos e 
membros da família.</string>
          </description>
          <description>
            <string language="x-mt-it">caratterizza 104 pellicole corte che eventi record
nella vita del Roosevelt dalla guerra Spagnolo-Americana in 1898 alla 
sua morte in 1919. Oltre che le scene di Roosevelt, queste 
pellicole includono i punti di vista delle figure del mondo, dei 
politici, dei monarchi e degli amici e dei membri della famiglia.</string>
          </description>
          <description>
            <string language="x-mt-el">χαρακτηρίζει 104 μικρού μήκους ταινίες που 
καταγράφουν τα γεγονότα στη ζωή Roosevelt από το 
spanish-American πόλεμο το 1898 στο θάνατό του το 1919. 
Εκτός από τις σκηνές Roosevelt, αυτές οι ταινίες 
περιλαμβάνουν τις όψεις των παγκόσμιων αριθμών, των πολιτικών, 
των μοναρχών, και των φίλων και των οικογενειακών μελών.</string>
          </description>
          <description>
            <string language="x-mt-es">ofrece 104 películas cortas que los 
acontecimientos de registro en la vida de Roosevelt de la guerra 
Español-Americana en 1898 a su muerte en 1919. Además de 
escenas de Roosevelt, estas películas incluyen opiniones las figuras 
del mundo, los políticos, los monarcas, y los amigos y los miembros 
de la familia.</string>
          </description>
          <keyword>
            <string language="x-mt-de">Sozialwissenschaften</string>
          </keyword>
          <keyword>
            <string language="x-mt-fr">Les Sciences Sociales</string>
          </keyword>
          <keyword>
            <string language="x-mt-pt">Ciências Sociais</string>
          </keyword>
          <keyword>
            <string language="x-mt-it">Scienze Sociali</string>
          </keyword>
          <keyword>
            <string language="x-mt-el">Κοινωνικές επιστήμες</string>
          </keyword>
          <keyword>
            <string language="x-mt-es">Ciencias Sociales</string>
          </keyword>
        </general>
        <metaMetadata>
          <identifier>
            <catalog>oercommons.org</catalog>
            <entry>1770207242</entry>
          </identifier>
          <language>en</language>
        </metaMetadata>
        <educational>
          <language>en</language>
        </educational>
        <rights>
          <copyrightAndOtherRestrictions>
            <source>copyrightAndOtherRestrictionsValues</source>
            <value>yes</value>
          </copyrightAndOtherRestrictions>
          <description>
            <string language="en">Custom License</string>
          </description>
        </rights>
      </lom>
    </metadata>
  </description>
  <manifestation>
    <identifier>
      <catalog>manifestation-cmr-id</catalog>
      <entry>104593</entry>
    </identifier>
    <name>
      <vocabularyID>LRE.manifestationNameValues</vocabularyID>
      <value>experience</value>
    </name>
    <item>
      <location>
        <uri>http://www.oercommons.org/courses/theodore-roosevelt-his-life-and-times-on-film</uri>
      </location>
    </item>
  </manifestation>
</expression>
